column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I have heard such great things about Bavette's Chicago and was so excited to visit and try it!! The ambiance is so cool
column2: very moody and reminds me of what the mobster days would've been like with the dim lighting and classy decor! Our server was very nice and knowledgeable
column4: 2 ordered because we love it and usually restaurants are very frugal with their servings. Not here
column5: there was at least 6 servings on each plate! We had enough to even put on our steaks! Absolutely heavenly!!
